question.question: Which of the following is a key component of therapeutic education for a patient with chronic adrenal insufficiency?
question.option_a: Avoiding all forms of physical exercise to prevent adrenal decompensation
question.option_b: Carrying a box of injectable hydrocortisone and injection equipment at all times
question.option_c: Taking a mineralocorticoid such as fludrocortisone in cases of corticotropic insufficiency
question.option_d: Following a low-sodium diet to manage adrenal insufficiency
